cohortName: [PL 42535714001] Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody positive vasculitis referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (42535714) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 42535714002] Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody positive vasculitis referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (42535714) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 42535714003] Vasculitis associated with Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody (ANCA)-associated vasculitis
logicDescription: Custom cohort of persons with vasculitis associated with ANCA
